item.description:
JerkFish Jamaican Restaurant is in a class of itâ€™s own in Middletown, CT. The Restaurant is the premier Jamaican West-Indian American restaurant in the local market place.

They strive for the total "backhome" Jamaican experience! Guests receive a great meal, and will also be provided with a fun atmosphere.The dining experience is always pleasing to the senses as it is to the palate.

The main focus at JerkFish Jamaican Restaurant is serving quality authentic food at great value and features a large selection of freshly prepared food. In addition, you will always have a variety of food daily that is full of flavor and zest at an unbelievable price!

The Restaurant is located in Middletown and has plenty of off street parking. They have assured me that separate checks will not be a problem.

So come to Jamaica with us...for the evening!!!
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Terri Bruno's table or Meetup table...

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: We're Going Jamaican...
